---
title: "Poisson-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rpois-4.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Pois4Call <- stream_in(file("rpois-4-Call-Revised-1211.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Pois4Result <- stream_in(file("rpois-4-1211_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Pois.4.OpenAI <- left_join(Pois4Call,Pois4Result)
Full.Pois.4 <- left_join(Pois4$params, Pois.4.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Pois.4.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Pois.4$Outcome <- map_chr(Pois4$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Pois4Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Pois.4$Outcome)
Full.Pois.4.1211 <- Full.Pois.4
```

```{r}
save(Full.Pois.4.1211, file="Full.Pois.4.1211.RData")
```
